TRIA พร้อมสำหรับการซื้อขายแล้ว!

TRIA is available for trading!

3d ago//KrakenFX
general
AI

Summary

TH

Kraken ประกาศว่า TRIA พร้อมให้ซื้อขายตั้งแต่วันที่ 3 กุมภาพันธ์ 2026 ผู้ใช้สามารถฝากเงินได้โดยไปที่ส่วน Funding เลือก TRIA และกด 'Deposit' แต่ต้องใช้เครือข่ายที่รองรับเท่านั้น เพื่อหลีกเลี่ยงการสูญเสียสินทรัพย์ TRIA เป็น neobank คริปโตแบบ self-custodial ที่สร้างบน cross-chain routing engine ที่อนุญาตให้ผู้ใช้ใช้จ่าย, staking และ swap ข้ามมากกว่า 200 เชนโดยไม่ต้องเสียค่า gas โดยมีค่าธรรมเนียมต่ำใน 150+ ประเทศ โทเคน TRIA เป็นสกุลเงินดั้งเดิมของระบบนิเวศ

EN

Kraken has announced that TRIA is now available for trading as of February 3, 2026. Users can fund their accounts by navigating to the Funding section and selecting TRIA for deposit, though they must use supported networks to avoid losing their tokens. TRIA is a self-custodial crypto neobank built on a cross-chain routing engine that enables users to spend, stake, and swap across more than 200 chains without gas requirements while maintaining low fees across 150+ countries. The TRIA token serves as the native currency for the platform's ecosystem. Trading via Kraken App and Instant Buy will be available once sufficient market liquidity is achieved, with geographic restrictions potentially applying.

Key Points

  • TRIA is now available for trading on Kraken starting February 3, 2026
  • TRIA is a cross-chain crypto neobank supporting 200+ chains with low fees
  • Trading via Kraken App and Instant Buy will be available when liquidity conditions are met

Article

We’re thrilled to announce that TRIA is available for trading on Kraken! Funding and trading TRIA trading is live as of February 3, 2026. To add an asset to your Kraken account, navigate to Funding, select the asset you’re after, and hit ‘Deposit’. Make sure to deposit your tokens into networks supported by Kraken. Deposits made using other networks will be lost. Here’s some more information about this asset : Tria (TRIA) is a self-custodial crypto neobank built on a cross-chain routing engine. The platform lets users spend, stake, and swap across 200+ chains—gasless, seedless, and stress-free. Tria unifies spending, trading, and earning in one app with some of the lowest fees across 150+ countries. The TRIA token powers the platform’s ecosystem. Please note: Trading via Kraken App and Instant Buy will be available once the liquidity conditions are met (when a sufficient number of buyers and sellers have entered the market for their orders to be efficiently matched). Geographic restrictions may apply Will Kraken make more assets available? Yes! But our policy is to never reveal any details until shortly before launch – including which assets we are considering. All of Kraken’s available tokens can be found here , and all future tokens will be announced on our Listings Roadmap and social media profiles . Our client engagement specialists cannot answer any questions about which assets we may be making available in the future.
